products.name: Everest Boots
products.description: Solid boots that you can wear in the most demanding situations. Guaranteed to hold up and make sure you get back home.

products.name: Extreme Backpack
products.description: Backpack that you cann use in the most extreme circumstances. Waterproof and fire resitant. Heavy duty for the extreme

products.name: Rapids Kayak
products.description: The Kayak that can conquer the Amazon. Great for the local lake or coastal kayaking in the ocean, and everything in between

products.name: Low Hikers
products.description: The boots that you can use to conquer any trail. And of course these boots are perfect for any of the trails in our trail reviews

products.name: Full Kit Combo
products.description: Everything you need for your next climbing adventure. A full starter kit to get you going. Full contents of kit will be listed when you add combo to cart

products.name: Coolfire Kayak
products.description: The Kayak will make you look cool in any environment. Bring the heat in the Coolfire Kayak

products.name: Bearclaw Boots
products.description: These boots were designed to be worn in the wilderness. Come walk on the wild side

products.name: Headlight Helmet
products.description: The helmet that lights the way. Know what lies ahaead in the worst weather or the darkest night

products.name: Crocodile Kayak
products.description: The Kayak that could survive the Ice Age. Perfect for a trip down the ruffest rapids

products.name: Gazelle Boots
products.description: Hiking boots that can be used in a variety of applications. Great for the beginning hiker or experienced pro

products.name: Climbing Combo
products.description: Small climbing starter kit to get you started. Contents of the kit will be listed when added to the cart

products.name: Amazon Kayak
products.description: The Kayak that could lead an expedition down the Amazon. Durable yet lightweight. Stong enough to withstand the bite of a Crocodile

products.name: Climbing Combo 2
products.description: Advanced climbing starter kit to get you started. Contents of the kit will be listed when added to the cart

products.name: Commando Kayak
products.description: The Kayak that is tough enough for a commando raid. High tech construction in a traditional design

products.name: Climbing Clips
products.description: Climbing clips in a bundle. Just choose the size and color

products.name: Assorted Climbing Clips Bundle
products.description: Climbing clips in a bundle. Contents of the bundle will be listed when added to the cart

products.name: Deluxe Helmet Bundle
products.description: Two helmet bundle for you and another adventurer to get started
